type: snow and ice control, grass cutting, lawn maintenance
short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools and equipment required to provide Snow and Ice Control and Grass Cutting/Landscape Maintenance.
description: The Service Contract is required for the period from May 1, 2024 to April 30, 2025 with an option to extend for two additional one year periods.
full_summary:
# Title
W6898-240657: Snow and Ice Control and Grass Cutting and Lawn Maintenance, Grand Falls and Edmundston, N.B.

## Title Translation
*English: Snow and Ice Control and Grass Cutting and Lawn Maintenance, Grand Falls and Edmundston, N.B.*French: *Déneigement et déglaçage et Tonte de pelouse et entretien paysager, Grand Sault et Edmundston (N.-B.)*

## Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: W6898-240657
* Tender Reference Number: WS4380640658
* Amendments: 0
* Publication Date: January 17, 2024
* Closing Date: February 6, 2024, 2:00 PM AST
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2025 (with possible extensions for 2 x 1-year periods)

## Notification Details
* Tender Status: Expired
* Category of Procurement: Service Contracting (SRV)
* Type of Procurement: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Various Free Trade Agreements (FTA) with countries such as South Korea, Panama, Chile, Peru, and Honduras

## Bid Requirements
* Bidders must provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, and equipment for Snow and Ice Control, Grass Cutting/Lawn Maintenance services for the Grand Falls Armoury, Grand Falls, and Edmundston Armoury, Edmundston, New Brunswick.
* Bidder must provide a detailed specification for their proposal, including timelines, schedules, and logical stages of construction.
* Bidder may request a debrief on the bid results within 15 working days after receiving notification of unsuccessful bid.
* Bidders are expected to submit their proposal in either official language of Canada.

## Contracting Information
* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Contracting Address: 11 Laurier St, Gatineau, Qc J1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Details
* Contact Information: Sonia Stockman (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18544653?extsite=MTg1NDQ
